name: Darkly GW2 Raidar
description: An unoriginal dark theme for gw2raidar.com. Theme is based off from bootswatch.com/darkly because I have no originality. Numbers might be difficult to read. There's not much I can do about it because all the scripted colors for the bar graphs makes it difficult to get a good readable color on a dark themed background, but I tried.
additional_info:
171217
Alignment fix on the encounters page when viewing outgoing buffs

171113
Updated for Global Stats page and their recent UI change

170909
Fixed applicable urls

170908
Changed pagination and button styles

170903
Minor fixes, added style settings, and changed the fonts to standard fonts. If you prefer the website's original font type "Raleway" into the font settings under "Advanced Style Settings" button before installing.

170902
Release, first time making one of these.
